system.description:
Everyone has heard of you. You're the legend! The hero! The one we're all looking up to! And we know you'll save the day, for sure!

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Legend, you must have earned great renown.

The Legend starts with The Legend Begins.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.legend.Item.kGnnC0pmdRcytL3k]{THE LEGEND BEGINS}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.legend.Item.Oae5pGPR0Wp48rXH]{ANYTHING YOU CAN DO, I CAN DO BETTER!}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.legend.Item.gEuy0ymu3uEfb8Pa]{HERO OF THE PEOPLE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.legend.Item.FLhBc7QtVzTsX9wS]{LOYAL FANS}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.legend.Item.o0WckacHAJcrtezA]{THE LEGEND NEVER DIES}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.legend.Item.5oYglB45DnQP39Re]{THE LEGEND SPREADS}

advancements.name: Increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
Take a Custom Move from any Basic playbook.
